fulltext:
NGUYEN NGOC HIEU - CPA Australia Associate 
Address:  
Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City 
Email: 
nguyenhieu0327@gmail.com  
Mobile: 
0909 782 517 
EXPERIENCES: 
2016 – present: Senior Consultant – Tricor Services Vietnam – Tricor Group 
Tax Compliance 
 Authorised by clients to coordinate with auditors in term of annual auditing.  
 Authorised by clients to liaise with tax authority and in term of tax compliance, tax 
examinations, auditing. 
 Consulting clients on professional tax compliance, tax utilization. 
 Preparing interim Corporate Income Tax (CIT) declaration, finalizing year-end CIT 
declaration, monthly, quarterly Value Added Tax (VAT) declaration, output VAT 
invoice usage report.  
 Reviewing business activities reports. 
 Year-end financial reporting & interim and year-end management reporting, tax 
reporting and reviewing of CIT, VAT, Withholdings Tax (WHT), Personal Income Tax 
(PIT). 
 Completing/reviewing accounting and tax documentation, reviewing terms and 
conditions of sales contracts. 
 Interpreting on financial report figures. 
 Consulting on monthly, quarterly, year-end expenses required adjustment. 
 Reconciling on reporting figures and compliance status to provide adjustments (if any) 
 Coordinating with HR on PIT for locals and expats, labour contracts, employee 
payables and insurance policies. 
 Updating with tax laws, composing notifications to clients. 
Data Analyzing Services 
 In charge of comparing data with relevant parties/departments. 
 Checking the terms and conditions of transactions in the period. 
 Reconciling the balance at the end of the period. 
 Comparing and monitoring incomes, expenses, depreciation of fixed assets, debts, tax 
obligations and other operations; 
 Performing data synthesis and reconciling accounting data. 
 Committing timely and accurate financial statements with deadlines. 
 Complying tax reports with tax regulations and deadlines. 
 Coordinating with relevant parties/departments to solve problems related to 
accounting and taxation. 
Payment Accounting Services 
 Accounting of account receivables / account payables. 
 Tracking with agents, customers, suppliers and other parties in term of payment, 
receivables and payables. 
 Clearing accounting payables (payment settlement) 
 Reconciling of account receivables / account payables at year-end. 
 Accounting of cash on hand, cash at bank. 
 Making cash/receipt payment. 
 Opening, closing, managing bank accounts. 
 Preparing payment request, bank cheque, bank payment, billing and invoicing. 
 Budgeting annually to track actual financial performance against the budget.  
 Bank transacting and collecting bank statements. 
 Preparing import export documentation. 
 Preparing loan agreements. 
Inventory Accounting Services 
 Inventory reporting on input, output and current inventory. 
Business Development 
 General business advisory related to foreign investment, legal compliance, licensing, 
post licensing, corporate secretarial services. 
2015 – 2016: Odyssey Resources Limited 
 Conversion bookkeeper – Accounting software: MYOB, Quickbook, Xero etc.  
 Executive administrative – External contact for Australian market. 
 Professional accountant – Australian superannuation fund. 
2014 – 2015: Vietnam Airlines & Lao Airlines 
 Service Representative – Tan Son Nhat Airport station 
EDUCATION: 
2018 – present: CPA Australia: Associate – Professional Level 
2011 – 2014: Bachelor of Business (Accountancy): RMIT University  
SKILLS: 
Communication, Client services & Networking: advanced English, executive assistant of 
the board of directors, front-line contact point with clients and a strong link with internal service 
teams; strong negotiating skill in term of pricing and contract terms and conditions, 
professional in writing and verbal communication which has been acquired through 
consultations and services. 
Technical computerizing: advanced user of MS Office and various accounting local and 
global software including MYOB, Quickbooks, Xero etc. 
Business development: assisting on strategic decisions to expand the current scopes of 
services and/or to improve the company operation. 
CRM: advanced managing the company current and potential clients with a list of more than 
1000 contacts.  
Multitasking & Organizing: comfortably performing professional services with conference 
calls, documents, notes and office administrative work. 
Team work and/or independent performance: reporting solely to management level 
whereas working concurrently with consultation service teams. 
Training: contributing to the whole team as a senior sharing experience, providing training to 
junior level - inherited groups. 
PART-TIME EMPLOYMENT: 
English Teacher: Advanced test of IELTS, TOEIC. 
REFERENCES: 
Mr. Lim Chor Ghee 
Ms. Chintanaphone Xayasane 
General Director – Tricor Vietnam 
General Manager - Lao Airlines 
chorghee.lim@vn.tricorglobal.com 
qvsgn@laoairlines.com 
+(84) 83 8686 288 
0912 070 045 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
